shathaka 34 k saha ardha shathaka 49 k mita athulath.shri lankawa wenuwen dwithwa shathaka labhin athara kuma sangakkarata pamanak dewani wana ohu me dakwa test dwithwa shathaka 7 k labagena thibenawa.mahelage hondama inima gana katha kirimedi eya ohuge mangala tharagaya sema ha eetath wada suwisheshi weyi.nawaka kridakayaku lesa krida karamin eda jyeshtayan thabu wartha desa bala siti mahela 2006 juli 27 wanida kolambaa es. es. si. pitiyedi dakunu aprikawata erehiwa krida karamin ema wartha binda damimata tharam dakshayek wiya.ehidi miniththu 752 k thula pandu 572 kata muhuna di 4 pahara 43 k saha ek haye paharak ella karamin lakunu 374 k labagath mahela siya test krikat diwiye hondama inima krida karanawa.siya krikat sagaya wu kumar sangakkara (lakunu 287) samanga ekwa lakunu 624 ka sabandathawak godanangana athara ema tharagaya inimakin saha lakunu 153 kin jayagrahanaya kirimata nayakathwaya laba denawa.ema sabandathawa loka test krikat ithihasaye wadima lakunu sabandathawa lesin wartha pothata ekwanawa.ema inimath samanga methek shri lankawa wenuwen wadima lakunu labagath inima krida kala mahela lowa hondama test inim atharin siwuwani thanata path wenawa.mahelata ihalin sitinne kodew supiri pithikaru brayan lara 375, oostreliyanu pithikaru mathiw hedn 380 saha palamu thana yalith brayan lara nodawi labagath lakunu 400 pamanaki.test krida karana sama ratakatama erehiwa shathaka raskaragena athi mahela wadima shathaka sankhyawak (8) saha ardha shathaka sankhyawak (10) wartha kara aththe engalanthayata erehiwayi.
